fullText: “Patriots,” which comes to Broadway following a London debut in a seamless, tech-savvy production by Rupert Goold (“Ink,” “American Psycho”) is an action-packed, engaging saga that follows Putin’s rise to power, going from Deputy Mayor of St. Petersburg, to Prime Minister, to President of Russia following the sudden resignation of Boris Yeltsin on the eve of the new millennium.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The descriptive language ('seamless,' 'action-packed, engaging') suggests positive reception, but this appears to be more plot summary than critical analysis, limiting confidence in the assessment. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights the engaging and well-produced nature of the show, suggesting a strong recommendation despite lacking detailed critique.
